name: Swamp on Breakfast!
description:
It's morning. It's time to eat bugs.

Swamp on Breakfast! is a fast and simple game where a frog with an insatiable hunger is trying to devour as many bugs as it can before his belly empties.

Catch bugs, but be aware of poisonous spiders for the sake of your healthy breakfast.

(mobile friendly) 

How to Play:
Just click on the bugs.

*This game was developed to be submitted to the Palette Jam 2 (8 Bits to Infinity). All the assets, code, music, and sound effects were developed in 7 days, between November 15 and 22, 2021. The art had been made using a selection of 8 colors found on  Rampy16 Palette by ANoob.
